nl_problem:
# Task: interval_merger
# Interface:
Class: Solution
Method: merge(self, arg1)

Given an array of intervals where `intervals[i] = [starti, endi]`, merge all overlapping intervals, and return an array of the non-overlapping intervals that cover all the intervals in the input.

Constraints:
- 1 <= intervals.length <= 10^4
- intervals[i].length == 2
- 0 <= starti <= endi <= 10^4
lisp_spec:
(task
  (name "merge")
  (signature ( (intervals (list (list int int))) ) (list (list int int)))
  (constraints
    (constraint "1 <= intervals.length <= 10^4")
    (constraint "intervals[i].length == 2")
    (constraint "0 <= starti <= endi <= 10^4")
  )
  (goal
    (description "Merge all overlapping intervals and return non-overlapping intervals.")
    (rule "Sort the intervals based on their start times.")
    (rule "Iterate through the sorted intervals and merge them if they overlap.")
    (return "An array of merged non-overlapping intervals.")
  )
)
